defines.name: HXCPP_M32
defines.description: Sets target arc to Mac OS X 32 bit

defines.name: IPHONE_VER
defines.description: Sets the version of target iOS via passing parameter to 'xcrun --sdk iphoneosX.X'. e.g.: `-D IPHONE_VER 9.1`.

defines.name: IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET
defines.description: Sets the version of target iOS via passing parameter to 'xcrun --sdk iphoneosX.X'. e.g.: `-D IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET 12.0`.
